name: Interview (Ensistura)
description:
(Note: The embedded version of the game does not work on some browsers)

The air is freezing and the sunshine burns, just another day in the Void. A new prisoner arrives today. Their fate, and perhaps yours this time, lies on your whims. Time for the interview.

Features as per the rules of the game jam:

  • 1 sprite (with different expressions)
  • 1 background
  • 1 music track
  • and <= 1000 words

Not related to the jam rules but there's also 3 endings.

This was made for the O2A2 2022 game jam! This is my first time completing, well, anything as far projects go.  I'm happy to have made it to the end!
